A smart calculator that uses AI to learn the user's math habits and preferences, adapting to their individual needs and providing personalized recommendations for faster and more accurate calculations.

A virtual calculator that uses augmented reality (AR) technology to project calculator keys onto a physical surface, allowing users to interact with the calculator in a more immersive and intuitive way.
A calculator that generates audio feedback to help users with dyslexia or other learning disabilities, providing a more accessible and inclusive way to perform calculations.
A calculator that uses block-based programming to teach children the basics of coding and programming, introducing them to fundamental concepts in a fun and interactive way.
